movies.Title: Breakfast Club
movies.Synopsis: Five high school students find themselves in school detention on Saturday and discover that they have a lot more in common than they thought.
movies.Cast: Emilio Estevez, Judd Nelson, Molly Ringwald

movies.Title: Jurassic Park
movies.Synopsis: Thanks to DNA fossilized in amber, John Hammond brings to life various species of dinosaurs and creates Jurassic Park, a theme park on an island in Costa Rica. But what seemed like a dream quickly turns into a nightmare.
movies.Cast: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum

movies.Title: Mulholland Drive
movies.Synopsis: After an accident on Mulholland Drive, an amnesiac woman and an aspiring actress travel through Los Angeles searching for answers on a journey beyond dreams and reality.
movies.Cast: Naomi Watts, Laura Harring, Justin Theroux

movies.Title: In the Mood for Love
movies.Synopsis: Two neighbors form a strong bond after they both suspect extramarital activities by their spouses. However, they agree to keep their platonic bond so as not to make similar mistakes.
movies.Cast: Tony Chiu-Wai Leung, Maggie Cheung, Siu Ping-Lam

movies.Title: Alien
movies.Synopsis: After responding to a call for help, the crew finds a ravenous and hideous creature aboard a spaceship.
movies.Cast: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt

movies.Title: Ghost
movies.Synopsis: Sam and Molly are very much in love. One day Sam is killed because of a dark business deal and is transformed into a ghost that wanders the streets.
movies.Cast: Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Whoopi Goldberg

movies.Title: Watchmen
movies.Synopsis: United States, 1980s, the Cold War is at its height, and superheroes, once admired, are now persecuted by the law. One day one of them, The Comedian, who worked for the CIA, turns up dead.
movies.Cast: Jackie Earle Haley, Patrick Wilson, Carla Gugino

movies.Title: Side Effects
movies.Synopsis: Emily is a young woman who becomes addicted to a new drug prescribed by her psychiatrist to control the anxiety she suffers from her husband's imminent release from prison
movies.Cast: Rooney Mara, Channing Tatum, Jude Law

movies.Title: John Wick
movies.Synopsis: John Wick, a former hitman, is confronted by mobster Viggo Tarazov, who offers a reward to whoever manages to end Wick's life.
movies.Cast: Keanu Reeves, Michael Nyqvist, Alfie Allen

movies.Title: Numb
movies.Synopsis: A chronically depressed screenwriter desperately tries to cure his condition when he meets the girl of his dreams.
movies.Cast: Matthew Perry, Lynn Collins, Kevin Pollak

movies.Title: Ready Player One
movies.Synopsis: Year 2045: Teenager Wade Watts is just one of millions of people who escape from the bleak real world to plunge into a utopian virtual world where anything is possible.
movies.Cast: Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Ben Mendelsohn
